mapper.select: SELECT r.reservation_id, u.nickname, z.zone_name AS campground_name, r.checkin_time, r.checkout_time, r.reservation_status, r.refund_status FROM reservations r JOIN users u ON r.provider_code = u.provider_code AND r.provider_user_id = u.provider_user_id JOIN campground_sites s ON r.reservation_site = s.site_id JOIN campground_zones z ON s.zone_id = z.zone_id

SELECT r.reservation_id, u.nickname, z.zone_name AS campground_name, r.reservation_site, r.reservation_date, r.checkin_time, r.checkout_time, r.reservation_status, r.refund_status, IFNULL(r.cancel_reason, '-') AS cancel_reason, r.requested_at, r.refunded_at FROM reservations r JOIN users u ON r.provider_code = u.provider_code AND r.provider_user_id = u.provider_user_id JOIN campground_sites s ON r.reservation_site = s.site_id JOIN campground_zones z ON s.zone_id = z.zone_id WHERE r.reservation_id = #{reservationId}
mapper.update: UPDATE reservations SET reservation_status = #{reservationStatus}, cancel_reason = #{cancelReason}, refund_status = #{refundStatus}, requested_at = #{requestedAt} WHERE reservation_id = #{reservationId}
